Package model

Class ParentalControl

java.lang.Object
model.ParentalControl
public class ParentalControl extends Object
The ParentalControl class is responsible for enforcing time-based limits on gameplay, tracking total playtime, session durations, and managing the revival of the bear. It interacts with the Bear object and provides functionality like session tracking and setting up playtime limits for guardians.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a ParentalControl object associated with a Bear instance.

  • Constructor Details

    • ParentalControl

      public ParentalControl(Bear bear)
      Constructs a ParentalControl object associated with a Bear instance. Initializes the total playtime and session count to zero and sets revival to enabled by default.
      Parameters:
      bear - The Bear object associated with this parental control system.

  • Method Details

    • startSession

      public void startSession()
      Starts a new play session by recording the current time. This method is invoked when the player starts a new session.

    • endSession

      public void endSession()
      Ends the current session, calculates the session duration, and adds it to the total playtime. If the session exceeds the playtime limit, an alert can be triggered (not implemented here).

    • setPlaytimeLimit

      public void setPlaytimeLimit(int minutes)
      Sets the playtime limit in minutes. The guardian can use this method to set a daily limit on the total playtime.
      Parameters:
      minutes - The new playtime limit in minutes.

    • setRevivalEnabled

      public void setRevivalEnabled(boolean enabled)
      Enables or disables the revival option for the bear. This method allows the guardian to decide whether the bear can be revived after death.
      Parameters:
      enabled - True if revival should be enabled, false otherwise.

    • canReviveBear

      public boolean canReviveBear()
      Checks if the bear is eligible for revival based on the settings. If revival is disabled or the bear is not dead, this will return false.
      Returns:
      True if the bear can be revived, false otherwise.

    • reviveBear

      public void reviveBear()
      Revives the bear if the revival option is enabled and the bear is dead. This method should be called when the guardian chooses to revive the bear.

    • getTotalPlaytimeMinutes

      public int getTotalPlaytimeMinutes()
      Returns the total playtime in minutes.
      Returns:
      The total playtime in minutes.

    • getTotalSessions

      public int getTotalSessions()
      Returns the total number of sessions played.
      Returns:
      The total number of sessions.

    • getPlaytimeLimit

      public int getPlaytimeLimit()
      Returns the current playtime limit in minutes.
      Returns:
      The current playtime limit in minutes.

    • isRevivalEnabled

      public boolean isRevivalEnabled()
      Returns whether the bear revival option is enabled.
      Returns:
      True if revival is enabled, false otherwise.

    • toggleCharacterRevival

      public void toggleCharacterRevival(boolean enabled)

    • isCharacterRevivalEnabled

      public boolean isCharacterRevivalEnabled()

    • setPassword

      public void setPassword(String password)

    • checkPassword

      public boolean checkPassword(String input)

    • getUserStatistics

      public String getUserStatistics()
